title: 怎么得啊......
author: dragon—you
txt_content:
我想问一下...
贡献和爱心怎么得啊.....[diamond_sword][diamond_sword]

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
爱心：到这来回答问题 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?gid=364 ，被采纳之后到这 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-415955-1-1.html 申请
贡献：到这 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-24179-1-1.html 爆照有两点，剩下的要靠做非常优秀的帖子获得
